verses.verse: "This is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> that you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> to them to make them <S%H6942>holy,<s%> to minister to me in the <S%H3547>priest<s%>'s office: <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H6499>bull<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish,<s%>

<S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H2471>cakes<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H7550>wafers<s%> <S%H4886>anointed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil:<s%> you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> them of fine <S%H2406>wheat<s%> <S%H5560>flour.<s%>
You shall <S%H5414>put<s%> them into <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5536>basket,<s%> and <S%H7126>bring<s%> them in the <S%H5536>basket,<s%> with the <S%H6499>bull<s%> and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams.<s%>

You shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> and shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> them with <S%H4325>water.<s%>

You shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H899>garments,<s%> and <S%H3847>put<s%> on <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3801>coat,<s%> the <S%H4598>robe<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod,<s%> the <S%H646>ephod,<s%> and the <S%H2833>breastplate,<s%> and <S%H640>clothe<s%> him with the skillfully woven <S%H2805>band<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod;<s%>
and you shall <S%H7760>set<s%> the <S%H4701>turban<s%> on his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5145>crown<s%> on the <S%H4701>turban.<s%>
Then you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H3332>pour<s%> it on his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and anoint <S%H4886>him.<s%>
You shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H3847>put<s%> coats on <S%H3801>them.<s%>

You shall <S%H2296>clothe<s%> them with <S%H73>belts,<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H2280>bind<s%> <S%H4021>headbands<s%> on <S%H3550>them:<s%> and they shall have the priesthood by a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2708>statute:<s%> and you shall <S%H4390>consecrate<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons.<s%>

"You shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> the <S%H6499>bull<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting:<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H6499>bull.<s%>
You shall <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H6499>bull<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting.<s%>

You shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H6499>bull,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> it on the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> with your <S%H676>finger;<s%> and you shall <S%H8210>pour<s%> out all the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H3247>base<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

You shall <S%H3947>take<s%> all the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that <S%H3680>covers<s%> the <S%H7130>innards,<s%> the <S%H3508>cover<s%> of the <S%H3516>liver,<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3629>kidneys,<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is on <S%H6999>them,<s%> and burn them on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

But the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H6499>bull,<s%> and its <S%H5785>skin,<s%> and its <S%H6569>dung,<s%> you shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp:<s%> it is a sin <S%H2403>offering.<s%>

"You shall also <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram;<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H352>ram.<s%>
You shall <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H352>ram,<s%> and you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> its <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> it <S%H5439>around<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

You shall <S%H5408>cut<s%> the <S%H352>ram<s%> into its <S%H5409>pieces,<s%> and <S%H7364>wash<s%> its <S%H7130>innards,<s%> and its <S%H3767>legs,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> them with its <S%H5409>pieces,<s%> and with its <S%H7218>head.<s%>

You shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> the whole <S%H352>ram<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar:<s%> it is a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> it is a <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma,<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

"You shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H352>ram;<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H352>ram.<s%>

Then you shall <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H352>ram,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> some of its <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> it on the <S%H8571>tip<s%> of the right <S%H241>ear<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and on the <S%H8571>tip<s%> of the <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H241>ear<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and on the <S%H931>thumb<s%> of their <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and on the big <S%H931>toe<s%> of their <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H7272>foot,<s%> and <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

You shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> that is on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and of the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> it on <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and on his <S%H899>garments,<s%> and on his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and on the <S%H899>garments<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%> with <S%H6942>him:<s%> and he shall be made holy, and his <S%H899>garments,<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>' garments with <S%H899>him.<s%>

Also you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> some of the <S%H352>ram<s%>'s <S%H2459>fat,<s%> the fat <S%H451>tail,<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that <S%H3680>covers<s%> the <S%H7130>innards,<s%> the <S%H3508>cover<s%> of the <S%H3516>liver,<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3629>kidneys,<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is on <S%H3225>them,<s%> and the right <S%H7785>thigh<s%> (for it is a <S%H352>ram<s%> of <S%H4394>consecration<s%>),

and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3603>loaf<s%> of <S%H3899>bread,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2471>cake<s%> of <S%H8081>oiled<s%> <S%H259>bread,<s%> and one <S%H7550>wafer<s%> out of the <S%H5536>basket<s%> of unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%> that is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

You shall <S%H7760>put<s%> all of this in <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H3709>hands,<s%> and in his <S%H1121>sons<s%>' <S%H3709>hands,<s%> and shall <S%H5130>wave<s%> them for a wave <S%H8573>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

You shall <S%H3947>take<s%> them from their <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and <S%H6999>burn<s%> them on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> on the burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> for a <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> it is an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

"You shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H2373>breast<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H352>ram<s%> of <S%H4394>consecration,<s%> and <S%H5130>wave<s%> it for a wave <S%H8573>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> and it shall be your <S%H4490>portion.<s%>

You shall <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> the <S%H2373>breast<s%> of the wave <S%H8573>offering,<s%> and the <S%H7785>thigh<s%> of the wave <S%H8573>offering,<s%> which is <S%H5130>waved,<s%> and which is heaved <S%H7311>up,<s%> of the <S%H352>ram<s%> of <S%H4394>consecration,<s%> even of that <S%H834>which<s%> is for <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and of that which is for his <S%H1121>sons:<s%>

and it shall be for <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> as their <S%H2706>portion<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> from the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> for it is a wave <S%H8641>offering:<s%> and it shall be a wave <S%H8641>offering<s%> from the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of their peace <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> even their wave <S%H8641>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

"The <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall be for his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H4888>him,<s%> to be anointed in <S%H4390>them,<s%> and to be consecrated in them.

<S%H7651>Seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall the <S%H1121>son<s%> who is <S%H3548>priest<s%> in his place <S%H3847>put<s%> them <S%H935>on,<s%> when he comes into the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> in the holy <S%H6944>place.<s%>
"You shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H352>ram<s%> of <S%H4394>consecration,<s%> and <S%H1310>boil<s%> its <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%>

<S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H352>ram,<s%> and the <S%H3899>bread<s%> that is in the <S%H5536>basket,<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting.<s%>

They shall <S%H398>eat<s%> those things with which atonement was <S%H3722>made,<s%> to <S%H4390>consecrate<s%> and <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> <S%H2114>them:<s%> but a stranger shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of <S%H6944>it,<s%> because they are holy.

If anything of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H4394>consecration,<s%> or of the <S%H3899>bread,<s%> <S%H3498>remains<s%> to the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> then you shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> the <S%H3498>remainder<s%> with <S%H784>fire:<s%> it shall not be <S%H398>eaten,<s%> because it is <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

"You shall <S%H6213>do<s%> so to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> according to all that I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4390>you.<s%> You shall consecrate them <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

Every <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> the <S%H6499>bull<s%> of sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> for <S%H3725>atonement:<s%> and you shall <S%H2398>cleanse<s%> the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> when you make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for <S%H4886>it;<s%> and you shall anoint <S%H6942>it,<s%> to sanctify it.

<S%H7651>Seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> <S%H4196>it:<s%> and the altar shall be most <S%H6944>holy;<s%> whatever <S%H5060>touches<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> shall be <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

"Now this is that which you shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar:<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old <S%H3117>day<s%> by <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H8548>continually.<s%>
The <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> you shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning;<s%> and the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> you shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> at <S%H6153>evening:<s%>

and with the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> a <S%H6241>tenth<s%> part of an ephah of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> mixed with the fourth <S%H7253>part<s%> of a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H3795>beaten<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and the fourth <S%H7243>part<s%> of a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H3196>wine<s%> for a drink <S%H5262>offering.<s%>

The <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> you shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> at <S%H6153>evening,<s%> and shall <S%H6213>do<s%> to it according to the meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> of the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and according to its drink <S%H5262>offering,<s%> for a <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma,<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

It shall be a <S%H8548>continual<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> where I will <S%H3259>meet<s%> with <S%H1696>you,<s%> to speak there to you.
There I will <S%H3259>meet<s%> with the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and the place shall be <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> by my <S%H3519>glory.<s%>

I will <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar:<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> also and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> I will <S%H6942>sanctify,<s%> to minister to me in the <S%H3547>priest<s%>'s office.
I will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and will be their <S%H430>God.<s%>

They shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> who brought them <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> that I might <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H3068>them:<s%> I am Yahweh their <S%H430>God.<s%>
